= Changelog for version _0.9a_ =
 * First release of *Syncless*.
 * Feature List  
   # Tagging of Folders.
       * From User Interface
       * From Window Context Menu
       * By Drag and Drop into *Syncless* Window
   # Manual/Seamless Mode for !Tag
       * Manual Sync for Tag.
       * N-Way Sync
       * Seamless Detection of Changes.
   # Filters
       * Extension Filter
   # Keyboard Shortcuts for Advanced User.
   # Easy access to tagged folder from *Syncless* window.
   # Auto detection of drive change
       * Profiles are automatically merged when thumb drive are plugin.
       * If Tags are in seamless mode, they will automatically be sync-ed.
